original_text:
Lava Gold
La slot Lava Gold, prodotta da Betsoft, ci catapulta indietro di milioni di anni, nell’era dei dinosauri. Ma in questo gioco, anziché scappare, bisogna raccogliere più oro possibile! Ciò che stiamo per raccontarvi è una storia appassionante, ricca di sorprese e giri gratis!
I cluster di Lava Gold
Con la slot Lava Gold non ci si annoia mai. Innanzitutto, c’è un bel display in formato 5×5 che mostra ad ogni giro 25 simboli. Ebbene, anziché le classiche linee di pagamento, su questa slot ad essere premiati sono i cluster, ovvero i blocchi di più simboli uguali. Ogni volta che vengono visualizzati 5 o  più simboli adiacenti, in qualsiasi direzione, otterrete un pagamento per i simboli inclusi. I cluster possono avere qualsiasi forma, perciò non importa se siano orizzontali, verticali, a croce, a “quadrato” o di altro tipo: ogni volta che almeno 5 simboli uguali saranno vicini tra loro, otterrete il pagamento per quel simbolo. Ovviamente, più simboli ci saranno meglio è!
Ma non è tutto. Ogni volta che si ottiene un cluster vincente, questo esplode e fa posto ad altri simboli, senza che il giocatore debba fare alcuna puntata. Questi possono creare ulteriori combinazioni vincenti, creando così dei free spin parziali che possono continuare fin quando vi saranno cluster vincenti. Può capitare di veder esplodere anche l’intero display di simboli!
Cosa rende davvero speciale Lava Gold
Va bene, vi direte, il meccanismo dei simboli a caduta lo si è già visto. Okay, ma Betsoft qui cala l’asso. Ogni volta che ottenete una combinazione vincente di un simbolo, questo va a riempire il “Lava Meter”, un misuratore sulla destra del display. Si parte dal simbolo J, quindi Q, K, A ecc. Una volta che lo si riempie tutto si attivano 10 free spin.
Ma sono 10 free spin speciali! Infatti, per ogni free spin vi è il rullo centrale completamente formato da un unico simbolo (normale o wild) e perciò si ottiene di sicuro una combinazione vincente (poiché sono 5 simboli) che può essere arricchita dai simboli adiacenti.
Ma ciò che è davvero fantastico è che c’è un moltiplicatore crescente: x1 al primo giro, x2 al secondo giro, x3 al terzo giro e così via fino al x10 dell’ultimo giro!
Se considerate che ci sono simboli wild (il vulcano), la fase bonus free spin può diventare davvero una fase d’oro!
Dettagli di Lava Gold
Lava Gold presenta un display 5×5 e un sistema di pagamento con cluster. La puntata minima è di 0,25€ per giro. La volatilità del gioco è media el’RTP è pari al 95,99%. È compatibile con sistemi operativi Windows, iOS e Android e vi si può giocare su dispositivi desktop e mobile.

Domande frequenti 
Quali sono le features della slot Lava Gold?

Lava Gold presenta due caratteristiche speciali quali le payline in forma di cluster e i free spin con moltiplicatore progressivo. Ai free spin si accede tramite il riempimento di un Lava Meter, man mano che si ottengono combinazioni vincenti coi vari simboli del gioco.



Dove si gioca alla slot Lava Gold con soldi veri?

Per giocare alla slot Lava Gold per denaro reale si può accedere ai casinò online menzionati in questa stessa pagina, dove è possibile anche provare personalmente slot per divertimento senza iscrizione.



Qual è l'RTP della slot Lava Gold?

La percentuale di Return to Player (Ritorno al Giocatore) della slot Lava Gold di Betsoft è pari al 95,99%

raw_translation.response:
Lava Gold is a slot game from Betsoft that takes us back millions of years to the era of dinosaurs. However, instead of running away, we must collect as much gold as possible! This exciting story is full of surprises and free spins that will keep you entertained.

With Lava Gold, you'll never be bored. The 5×5 display shows 25 symbols at every round, and instead of traditional paylines, you'll be rewarded for clusters of the same symbols. Whenever at least five adjacent symbols are displayed, in any direction, you'll receive a payout. The clusters can be any shape, so it doesn't matter whether they're horizontal, vertical, cross-shaped, squared, or any other type. The more symbols there are, the better!

But that's not all. Every time you get a winning cluster, it explodes and makes way for other symbols, without you having to place any bets. These can create further winning combinations, creating partial free spins that can continue as long as there are winning clusters. You might even see the entire display of symbols explode!

What really makes Lava Gold special is the "Lava Meter." Every time you get a winning combination of a symbol, it fills up the meter on the right of the display. Starting from the J symbol, then Q, K, A, and so on, once the meter is filled, you'll activate 10 special free spins. These spins are unique because each one has a middle reel that's entirely made up of either a normal or wild symbol. This ensures a winning combination (since there are five symbols), which can be enriched by adjacent symbols.

But what's really fantastic is the increasing multiplier: x1 on the first spin, x2 on the second spin, x3 on the third spin, and so on up to the x10 of the last spin! With wild symbols (the volcano), the free spin bonus round can truly become a golden opportunity!

Lava Gold has a 5×5 display and a cluster payout system. The minimum bet is 0.25€ per round. The game volatility is medium, and the RTP is 95.99%. It's compatible with Windows, iOS, and Android operating systems and can be played on desktop and mobile devices.

Frequently Asked Questions:
What are the features of the Lava Gold slot?

Lava Gold has two special features: cluster paylines and increasing multiplier free spins. You can access the free spins by filling in the Lava Meter as you get winning combinations with the various symbols in the game.

Where can I play Lava Gold slot for real money?

You can play the Lava Gold slot for real money at the online casinos mentioned on this same page, where you can also try the slot for fun without registration.

What is the RTP of the Lava Gold slot?

The Return to Player (RTP) percentage of Betsoft's Lava Gold slot is 95.99%. As an experienced gambler, you know this is a relatively high RTP, which makes this game a great choice for any serious player.

Review:
 
Gameplay Mechanics and Features

Lava Gold features a 5x5 display with a payment system based on clusters of matching symbols instead of traditional paylines. Each adjacent cluster of 5 or more matching symbols results in a payment. The game also includes a cascading symbols mechanism where any winning cluster explodes and makes room for other symbols, thereby creating additional winning combinations that do not require any extra bets. The game's wild symbol is a volcano that can substitute any symbol to form a winning cluster.

Cluster Feature and Symbol Matching

In Lava Gold, players earn payments based on cluster matches made up of 5 or more adjacent symbols, which can be arranged in any direction or shape. Clusters can be horizontal, vertical, cross-shaped, or square-shaped as long as they have at least 5 adjacent matching symbols. The game has a high win potential as a result of its cascading symbols mechanism, which creates additional winning combinations.

Lava Meter and Free Spins

Once a winning cluster is created in Lava Gold, the Lava Meter gauge on the right side of the display is filled. Once full, the player is awarded 10 free spins that come with a progressive multiplier, starting at x1 and increasing up to x10. During each free spin, the middle reel is completely filled with a single symbol (normal or wild), guaranteeing a winning combination. This phase offers an excellent chance for players to earn additional payouts.

Compatibility and Accessibility

Lava Gold is a slot game compatible with Windows, iOS, and Android operating systems, allowing players to access it on desktop and mobile devices. The game does not require players to download any additional software and can be accessed directly from their web browser.

Volatility and Betting Options

Lava Gold is a medium-volatility slot game with a minimum bet of €0.25 per spin. The RTP of the game is 95.99%, which is above the average RTP found in most online slots. The game allows players to adjust their betting preferences based on their preferred wagering habits.

Review: Experience the thrill of Lava Gold, a Betsoft slot game that transports us back millions of years to the era of dinosaurs. But in this game, instead of running away, you must collect as much gold as possible! This is an exciting story, full of surprises and free spins!

The Cluster Feature in Lava Gold
With Lava Gold, you'll never get bored. First of all, there is a beautiful 5x5 display that shows 25 symbols on each spin. But instead of the classic paylines, this slot awards clusters, which are blocks of matching symbols. Whenever 5 or more adjacent symbols are displayed, in any direction, you get a payment for the symbols included. The clusters can be of any shape, so it doesn't matter if they are horizontal, vertical, cross-shaped, square-shaped or any other type: every time at least 5 matching symbols are close to each other, you will get paid for that symbol. Of course, the more symbols there are, the better!

But that's not all. Every time you get a winning cluster, it explodes and makes room for other symbols, without the player having to place any bets. These can create additional winning combinations, thus creating partial free spins that can continue as long as there are winning clusters. It's possible to see the entire display of symbols explode!

What Makes Lava Gold Truly Special
Okay, you may say, we've already seen the cascading symbols mechanism. Alright, but Betsoft pulls out all the stops here. Every time you get a winning combination of a symbol, it fills up the "Lava Meter", a gauge on the right side of the display. It starts with the J symbol, then Q, K, A, etc. Once the gauge is full, 10 free spins are activated.

But these are 10 special free spins! In fact, for each free spin, the middle reel is completely filled with a single symbol (normal or wild) and therefore you are guaranteed a winning combination (since there are 5 symbols) that can be enriched by adjacent symbols.

But what's really fantastic is that there is a growing multiplier: x1 on the first spin, x2 on the second spin, x3 on the third spin, and so on up to x10 on the final spin!

Considering that there are also wild symbols (the volcano), the free spin bonus phase can truly become a golden phase!

Details of Lava Gold
Lava Gold features a 5x5 display and a payment system with clusters. The minimum bet is €0.25 per spin. The volatility of the game is medium and the RTP is 95.99%. It's compatible with Windows, iOS and Android operating systems and can be played on desktop and mobile devices.
